title: Example Podcast Episode 123
full_transcript: This is the full transcript of the podcast episode...

transcripts.0:10: Host: Welcome to Example Podcast Episode 123.
transcripts.1:09: Guest: Hi, thanks for having me.
transcripts.2:35: Host: So tell us, what inspired you to start your own business?
transcripts.4:20: Guest: Well, I've always been interested in entrepreneurship...
